flawed_nl_solution:
He has 20 white marbles because 100 x 0.2 = <<100*0.2=20>>20
He has 30 black marbles because 100 x 0.3 = <<100*0.3=30>>30
He has 45 color marbles because 100 - 20 - 30 = <<100-20-30=45>>45
He earns $1 from white marbles because 20 x 0.05 = <<20*0.05=1>>1
He earns $3 from the black marbles because 30 x 0.1 = <<30*0.1=3>>3
He earns $9 from the colors because 45 x 0.2 = <<45*0.2=9>>9
He earns $13 in total because 1 + 3 + 9 = <<1+3+9=13>>13
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 45. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
